channel.title: Tournament-of-Books-2025 on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Tournament-of-Books-2025 on Strat

item.title: Poor Deer
item.description: Devastating. Frame narrative. Well-delivered magical realism. Sign me up.

item.title: Sparrow
item.description: An old man recounts the story of his childhood, as he remembers it, living in a brothel in the time of the Roman Empire in Spain.

item.title: Service Model
item.description: Charles, a valet robot, is let go from his job and then goes on a journey of self-discovery. Hijinks ensue.

item.title: Glorious Exploits
item.description:
Around 400 BCE, in Syracuse, Dumb and Dumber want to put on a play by Euripides.

They’ve got no actors, no costumes, no sets, no money and little to no intelligence. But, as they say, where there is a quarry filled with starving Athenian refugees, there’s a way.

item.title: The Ministry of Time
item.description: A woman working for the Ministry of Time is tasked with helping assimilate a sailor pulled through time, who more than a hundred years prior was on a doomed Arctic expedition and would have died otherwise. Hijinks ensue.

item.title: Held
item.description: A tale spanning between World War I and our modern day told through short evocative moments displaced through time from the POVs of people related to one another.

item.title: Orbital
item.description: Poetic stream of consciousness-y novel following six astronauts on a space station orbiting the Earth over one day of low earth orbits while they contemplate their lives, the world and the many people they’ve left behind.

item.title: The Husbands
item.description:
An unmarried woman comes back home after a night out, only to find a strange man in her home.

He claims to be her husband and she confirms this…

And there’s more husbands where he came from (the attic). Hijinks ensue.

item.title: The Extinction of Irena Rey
item.description: Eight translators travel to Poland to translate Irena Rey’s next novel. Hijinks ensue.
